devdoc.details: This contract allows users to perform a Zap operation by swapping ETH for Zero tokens, adding liquidity to Nile LP, and locking LP tokens.

constructor.details: Initializes the contract with required parameters.

params._locker: The address of the LP Token Locker contract.
params._odos: The address of the Odos Router contract.
params._zero: The address of the Zero Token contract.

zapAndStake(uint256,uint256,uint256,byte.details: Executes the Zap operation by swapping ETH for Zero tokens, adding liquidity to Nile LP, and locking LP tokens.

params.duration: The duration for which the LP tokens will be locked.
params.odosSwapData: The data required for the Odos swap.
params.wethAmount: How much WETH the user will pass into the LP token
params.zeroAmount: How much ZERO the user will pass into the LP token

devdoc.title: ZapLockerLP
